resources.string: HackerHub is an app that showcases all of the apps I have published to Google Play.
RunRunRun is a WIP platformer made with Unity. At this moment in time it is extremely bare bones.
AMOLED Calculator is a simple calculator app made just for phones with AMOLED displays.
HackerHub, the place home of the Sunset Discord Bots and much more!
You do not have an internet connection!
